description: Akane is the class representative of Kouta`s class, and wears glasses. Due to this, she has a high sense of regulations, and therefore disagrees with Kouta`s and Chizuru`s close high school relationship. She is on good terms with Kouta, and worries about his relationship with Chizuru. Also, she is known to be intolerant of alcohol.
name: Asahina Akane
